definition: Retrieval-Augmented Generation - AI technique that combines information retrieval with text generation to provide contextually relevant responses
technicalNote: Used in the AI assistant to provide contextually relevant responses based on case documents and legal precedents

definition: Service Level Agreement - A commitment between a service provider and a client that defines the expected level of service
technicalNote: System tracks SLA compliance for case processing times, response deadlines, and deliverable timelines

definition: Dispute Resolution Council - Administrative body established to resolve specific types of legal disputes outside traditional court systems
Assessment - Process of evaluating case merits, evidence quality, and determining appropriate legal strategy
technicalNote: System supports automated case assessment workflows with checklist templates and evaluation criteria

definition: Role-Based Access Control - Security model that restricts system access to authorized users based on their assigned roles
technicalNote: System uses hierarchical RBAC with roles like Admin, Partner/CA, Staff, and Client, each with specific permissions

definition: Goods and Services Tax - Comprehensive indirect tax levied on the supply of goods and services
Document Management System - Software platform for storing, organizing, tracking, and managing electronic documents
technicalNote: Integrated with case management for automatic document categorization, version control, and secure sharing

definition: Application Programming Interface - Set of protocols and tools for building software applications and enabling system integration
technicalNote: REST APIs available for calendar integration, document sync, and external system connections

definition: Structured framework defining when and how issues should be escalated to higher levels of authority or expertise
technicalNote: Automated escalation rules based on case priority, SLA breaches, and task overdue status

definition: Centralized view showing adherence to legal, regulatory, and internal requirements across all cases and processes
Complete progression of a legal case from initial intake through resolution, including all stages and milestones
technicalNote: System tracks 8 standard lifecycle stages with customizable workflows and automatic status updates

definition: Previous court decision that serves as an authoritative rule or pattern for future similar cases
Time spent working on client matters that can be charged to the client according to the fee agreement
technicalNote: System tracks time automatically with task-based logging and generates billing reports

definition: Pre-trial procedure where parties exchange information and evidence relevant to the case
Secure online platform where clients can access case information, documents, and communicate with their legal team
technicalNote: Role-based access ensures clients only see their own cases and approved documents

definition: Original adjudicating authority that makes the initial decision in tax and regulatory matters
technicalNote: Proper Officer / Commissionerate level - first level of decision-making

definition: First appellate authority that reviews decisions made by adjudication authorities
technicalNote: Commissioner (Appeals) / Appellate Authority under GST Act

definition: Authority with revisional jurisdiction to review and modify orders of lower authorities
technicalNote: Section 108 GST Act / Revisional Board - supervisory jurisdiction

definition: Goods and Services Tax Appellate Tribunal - quasi-judicial body hearing appeals against orders of appellate authorities
technicalNote: Tribunal bench level - established under GST Act for dispute resolution

definition: Customs, Excise and Service Tax Appellate Tribunal - quasi-judicial body for customs and indirect tax disputes
Income Tax Appellate Tribunal - quasi-judicial body hearing appeals on income tax matters
Head bench of a tribunal with administrative and jurisdictional authority over regional benches
technicalNote: Principal/Head Bench coordinates with regional benches and handles complex matters

definition: Constitutional court at the state level with original and appellate jurisdiction
technicalNote: State high courts hear appeals from tribunals and exercise writ jurisdiction

definition: Apex court of India with final appellate jurisdiction over all courts and tribunals
technicalNote: Constitutional court at national level - highest judicial authority in India
